questions.question: Which programming language is known for its use in web development and has a mascot named Guido?
What does CSS control in web development?
questions.answer: Cascading Style Sheets - controls presentation and layout

questions.question: Which data structure follows Last In, First Out (LIFO) principle?
What is the purpose of version control systems like Git?
questions.answer: To track changes in source code and collaborate on projects
